snippet: A new rule would require a movie review from The New York Times or The Los Angeles Times to qualify a documentary feature for the Academy Awards, according to a draft of the rule.
abstract: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences is poised to set a new rule that would require a movie review from The New York Times or The Los Angeles Times newspapers to qualify a documentary feature for the Academy Awards.
lead_paragraph: A new rule would require a movie review from The New York Times or The Los Angeles Times to qualify a documentary feature for the Academy Awards, according to a draft of the rule.

headline.seo: Documentary Filmmakers Alarmed by Proposed Oscar Rule
headline.main: Oscar Rule Will Cull Nonfiction Contenders
headline.print_headline: Oscar Rule Will Cull Nonfiction Contenders

keywords.value: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences
keywords.name: organizations
